Our Projects

All of our work is related to incorporating Native Plants back into the landscape which they belong. We can dramatically decrease the ecological damage of the suburban spawl.

Leonia Public Library

Common Yarrow, Eastern Colombine, Butterfly Milkweed, Geranium, Anise Hyssop, Common Milkweed, Christmas Ferns, Purple Coneflower, Late Purple Aster, Grey Goldenrod

Terry Lanes - Belleville

Common Yarrow, Eastern Colombine, Butterfly Milkweed, Geranium, Anise Hyssop, Common Milkweed, Christmas Ferns, Purple Coneflower, Late Purple Aster, Grey Goldenrod

Pocket Garden - Paramus

Common Yarrow, Eastern Colombine, Butterfly Milkweed, Geranium, Anise Hyssop, Common Milkweed, Christmas Ferns, Purple Coneflower, Late Purple Aster, Grey Goldenrod,

Home Garden - Teaneck

Common Yarrow, Eastern Colombine, Butterfly Milkweed, Geranium, Anise Hyssop, Common Milkweed, Christmas Ferns, Purple Coneflower, Late Purple Aster, Grey Goldenrod,
